rows.label: qst701006_msg0001
rows.name:
Bother me as much as you like, I'm
not going to be changing my mind.
Go home!

rows.label: qst701006_msg0002
rows.name: Oh, well I guess I'll just leave then...

rows.label: qst701006_msg0003
rows.name: Rita! What on Alst...?

rows.label: qst701006_msg0004
rows.name:
I heard you were worried about me,
so here I am!

rows.label: qst701006_msg0005
rows.name:
How are you doing, Dad?
Is everything all right?

rows.label: qst701006_msg0006
rows.name: Aye. You?

rows.label: qst701006_msg0007
rows.name:
Never better! All thanks to Kaede-chan
and these lovely people.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0008
rows.name: This lot?

rows.label: qst701006_msg0009
rows.name:
I owe them my life, Dad! They helped
me when I was in a tight spot. They
picked me up and set me straight.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0010
rows.name: You don't say.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0011
rows.name: They told me the capital was in trouble.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0012
rows.name:
And I know how you always treat the
buildings you make like your children.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0013
rows.name:
So...it must have been tough, huh?
Seeing your children destroyed right
in front of your eyes like that...

rows.label: qst701006_msg0014
rows.name:
You're not wrong, lass.
Just remembering that day is...
Well, let's just say, I don't care to.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0015
rows.name:
Makes me want to strangle someone.
Either that bastard as did it, or me
as couldn't do nowt about it.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0016
rows.name:
That's not true, Dad. There's plenty
you can do. You can use your skills
to help people. You can make it right!

rows.label: qst701006_msg0017
rows.name:
I'm so sorry I wasn't here when it
happened. I should have been.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0018
rows.name: It's OK, lass.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0019
rows.name:
So, for this shelter of yours, best way
to go is to expand the inn's basement,
I reckon. Just need the right materials.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0020
rows.name: Wait, so does that mean you'll help?

rows.label: qst701006_msg0021
rows.name:
I'm not going to refuse the folks
who saved my daughter's life.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0022
rows.name: Thank you so much, Dad!

rows.label: qst701006_msg0023
rows.name: Wow. Quite the change of heart.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0024
rows.name:
People are truly splendid in their
complexity.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0025
rows.name:
Hey everyone! Dad says we need to
gather Muscle Branches, Bismuth Slabs,
Puzzletree Wood, and, er...

rows.label: qst701006_msg0026
rows.name:
Deer Wood and Alloy Sheeting.
We need a certain amount of each.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0027
rows.name:
I'm sure we'll need a lot of materials
in order to build a nice strong shelter.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0028
rows.name:
Dad's going to go to the inn to plan
the construction, so he said we should
take the stuff there when we get it.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0029
rows.name:
Leave it to us! We'll find those
materials in no time at all.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0030
rows.name:
I'll do as much as I can to lend a hand.
For now, I'll ask around and see if
there's anyone else who wants to help!

rows.label: qst701006_msg0031
rows.name:
Adel. I meant what I said before.
But even so, I must thank you for
helping my daughter.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0032
rows.name:
I'm doing this job because of the
debt I owe you for that.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0033
rows.name:
Thank you all the same. I won't
begrudge you your opinion of me.

rows.label: qst701006_msg0034
rows.name: Thank you for your help, Zain-san.
